gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.io
Interface IWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
BMPWriter, GIFWriter, JP2Writer, JPGWriter, PNGWriter, PNMWriter, TIFWriter
public interface IWriter

Image Writer interface; implementing classes must serialize provided BufferedImage. Writer properties may be provided to the underlying implementation to define compression levels and other format specific parameters.

Author:
Ryan Chute

Method Summary
 void setWriterProperties(java.util.Properties props)
          Set the Writer Implementations Serialization properties

          Write a BufferedImage instance using implemenation to the provided OutputStream.
